Package pl.polsl.student.jakunow552.bestbankingoffer.model

Class BankingOffer

java.lang.Object
pl.polsl.student.jakunow552.bestbankingoffer.model.BankingOffer
Direct Known Subclasses:
CreditOffer, PersonalAccountOffer
public abstract class BankingOffer extends Object
Main class, all other classes used in model extends this class.

bankName - bank name that have this offer.

offerName - custom name of this offer

description - descripton of the offer

offerType - type of offer (set only by the method setOfferType used in subclass constructor)

properties - hash map with property String name as a key and float value.

Version:
1.0-FINAL
Author:
Jakub Nowakowski

    • setProperty

      public void setProperty(String name, float value)
      Method add new property or modify existing one.
      Parameters:
      name - String name of property.
      value - float value of property.

      If there is existing name of property same as provieded value will be updated.

    • compareOffers

      public BankingOffer compareOffers(BankingOffer offer)
      This method is overridden by subclasses methods. Each class applies own logic to compare properties.

    • checkTypeCoherence

      public void checkTypeCoherence(BankingOffer a, BankingOffer b) throws TypeException
      This method comapres offer obejct types and throws exception when they do not mach.
      Parameters:
      a - first offer object to compare BankingOffer.
      b - second offer offer object to compareBankingOffer.
      Throws:
      TypeException - exepction thrown when type of comapring objects is different.
